title: AI-Powered Crop Diagnosis from Photo
description: A farmer takes a photo of a diseased leaf with their phone and asks the agent 'What's wrong with my plant?'.

tasks.description: Analyze the user-submitted image to identify the crop type and the visual symptoms of the disease.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the plant as a tomato with lesions characteristic of early blight.

tasks.description: Provide a diagnosis of the most likely disease.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent diagnoses the disease as Early Blight.

tasks.description: Recommend a treatment plan, including appropriate fungicides and cultural practices to reduce disease spread.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a comprehensive treatment recommendation.
